game.name: Monster Truck Freestyle 2020
game.description:
Are you waiting for the introduction of real online racing sensation? If so, your search ends here as we have brought to you a brand new car driving simulator that includes everything you need to get the adrenaline rush in your body. Forget all the racing challenges you have ever faced and join Monster Truck Freestyle 2020 to be crazy, daring and a bit wild! We promise that your every minute will get entertained fully while killing your boring hours to the optimum level.

Hey! You would have multiple jaw-dropping missions to complete and interact with new things that will definitely help enjoy fun without disturbing your comfort zone. In this brand new racing game, you will have to control a monster truck to complete different missions. Choose your truck and level and get ready to take care of different tasks ranging from parking your vehicle at the designated area and hitting the ball in the goal to climbing mountains and driving through gaps and zig-zag tracks!

Be careful and try to make it through in 15 different and challenging levels in this 3D driving simulator! Make sure to overcome all the obstacles and challenges before the time runs out. Wow! Your every good performance will be rewarded with the star rating. The finer you play the higher stars you will be able to grab in this HTML5 truck game. Put your driving skills to the test to handle your truck through all of the checkpoints and park it at the blue zones timely! Do not forget to use the handbrake if needed to avoid any delay. Browse our other popular truck driving simulating games and have fun for free without download on atmegame.com!
